titles: The declaration of almighty God, in some few texts of scripture, recommended to the reverend conforming divines: / by G.B. B. of S----b---y ... being the publick fast appointed to implore God's assistance for the reduction of Ireland, and the overthrow of the late King James, and his rebellious forces.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
